subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets took offense to a hard slide by Phillies second baseman Chase Utley, who barreled into second baseman Ruben Tejada during the Phillies’ 3-2 victory.
snippet: The Mets took offense to a hard slide by Phillies second baseman Chase Utley, who barreled into second baseman Ruben Tejada during the Phillies’ 3-2 victory.
